message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12000.  I believe it's a great deal for you, considering its value. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but $12000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to consider a price of $8000
Bob, I understand your budget concerns.  I'm willing to come down to $10000, which is the absolute minimum I can accept. This reflects the true value of the product.  Let's close this deal!
